title: Understanding PTSD Symptoms
text: PTSD, or Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder, is a mental health condition triggered by experiencing or witnessing a traumatic event. It is important to recognize the symptoms to provide appropriate support and treatment.

title: Common Symptoms of PTSD
text: PTSD symptoms can be grouped into four main categories: intrusive memories, avoidance, negative changes in thinking and mood, and changes in physical and emotional reactions.

hintAnswer: intrusive thoughts or memories of the trauma
title: Identifying Intrusive Memories
text: Intrusive memories are unwanted, distressing memories of the traumatic event that can occur at any time. These can include flashbacks or nightmares.
